tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Heartly thank god üôèüèªfor brining Dr Jayashree mam into my life.My journey with Dr.Jayashree mam started since 2021.
 I have a very pleasant and life changing experience with my doctor.Here is my story.I had my first baby miscarriage in 60 days so I was depressed and stressed and mentally weak. Physically I had a lot to undergo like irregular periods and mental stress. So I decided to go for a doctor's consultation and at the first meeting the doctor gave me confidence and medicines and gave some morale boosting advice which helped me recover from my first trauma.
        Her medication and treatment made me better and I was able to get back normal.
        No other doctor could be as friendly as she was. Jayashree madam easily understood my health and mental status as well.
        Her fees are according to market and there is no overcharging. I can call or message her at anytime and she is there for me. When she's free at clinic she laughs and enjoys with her patients. she attends phone call of patients,in case mam is busy,she will call back asap. Nowadays no doctors talk on the phone with patients.but she is kind and friendly. 
         Every time I meet mam, she keeps telling ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt worry ,just stay positive and keep your mind free, everything will be fine‚Äù.Her postive thoughts and encouraging words made me feel strong.i am so blessed to find Dr. Jeyashree mam in this corner of earth. Whenever I get an appointment with doctor, I never waited too long for consultation. Also, Dr. Jeyashree mam takes time to talk to me, clear all our doubts no matter the no of patients waiting for consultation.
         My husband and I decided to go for a baby and the doctor gave good planning and advice and also some medication.By god's grace I got pregnant again and  From then our journey started with the doctor more frequently.
      I believe more than the medicines, it‚Äôs the positive energy and the encouragement helped me keep away the fear about the miscarriage again.
      Treatment wise Dr. Jeyashree mam has prescribed me what I actually need. The scan facility in the clinic is the added advantage. The Consultation fee and the Scan charges are very very reasonable compared to what other hospitals charge. She gave complete confidence and positivity to forget the initial trauma and I gained confidence and we visited the doctor every month. Everything went well with doctors advice . I followed everything well. Every checkp doctor gave diet charts personal advice and medication.Doctor fees is normal and affordable. She prescribed only limited medicine. 
       On 22feb I got labour pain and visited doctor she advised to get admitted in hospital. She gave me the confidence and
She treated me as her own child.With half an hour she came to Rainbow hospital and did a complete normal delivery for me.
    All thanks to the jayashree mam kept on motivating me.i am really thankful to her for my successful and beautiful pregnancy journey.I m so much thankful and grateful for rest of my life. I recommend this doctor to everyone .
       Thank you mam..I have a beautiful journey with you .Thanks a lot mamüòò

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
THE "FLORENCE NIGHTINGALE" GYNEC DOCTOR (not a nurse)
Being diabetic I was being treated gingerly by most hospitals that asked me to find an expert gynecologist to remove my uterus since I was diagnosed with adenomyosis and had already had C-sections.
Dr. Jayashree was a god-sent savior who had a no-nonsense clear-headed approach to the medical issues at hand - giving me a week of insulin shots recommendation to bring down the sugar levels so that the surgery could be carried out.
What speeded up my recovery from the expertly conducted laparoscopic surgery - hysterectomy, ovary (with cyst) removed that wasn't spotted earlier, and hernia (again not found previously in diagnostic checkup) patched up - was THE LOVE AND PERSONAL ATTENTION provided.
Last but not the least I was required to be hospitalized for just two days (one day prior and on surgery day) at Sunrays Laparascopic Centre, Ashok Nagar.
I vouch whole-heartedly for the professionalism of Dr. Jayashree Sharma and loved the whole experience of getting back to hale and hearty!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is very friendly and explained about the Disease  and treated very very well. I and my mom feel very very satisfied and happy. My mom and me both treated by Mam in very good manner. we feel very satisfied. we got cured very soon. I felt very very happy and blessed that I come to know about such a great Doctor, such a great human. 

Thank you so much Mam for your kind explanation, guidance and treatment Mam. Thank you once again Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started my pregnancy journey with Dr. Jayashree from my 3rd trimester. Doctor has a wonderful way of guiding us through the pregnancy. She does not prescribe any unnecessary medications/supplements or tests/scans. One of the few doctors who does not make us panic unnecessarily by quoting medical terms and their values. She makes us feel confident about our body‚Äôs ability to go through pregnancy and delivery. Doctor explains physical examinations clearly before conducting them . By the time the baby is ready to be born, doctor almost becomes a family member. Even when I was in active labour, she helped me remain calm and composed by coaching me through the process. We don‚Äôt have to read any pregnancy or childbirth tutorials. We just need to follow the doctor‚Äôs advice to have a fulfilling experience in child birth and an easy postpartum recovery. Trustworthy and highly recommended!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: This was my first pregnancy and we went to the clinic as it was nearest to our home. In the initial few days we could not figure the embryo in the scan and had concluded a blighted ovum. However, madam reposed faith and provided constant support, counselling with patience  and guidance apart from effective prognosis and treatment in a cost effective manner. This constant suppport helped us become first time parents in a seamless manner with normal vaginal delivery with a healthy baby. Thank you mam for everything that you have provided. One of the most genuine doctors we have met.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She never sounded like a doctor to me, it was like discussing with a family member, she gave a patient hearing and after looking into my problems, through my reports she eased my tension, with positive reaction, though I felt the report reflected some high values. She has also suggested a few more blood test to correlate with the previou report before suggesting any remedy. Overall I felt half my problem is solved even before taking any medicine, this is a nice experience. Thanks to her, and wish her good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
